text: G-Unit Records is a record label started by the musician 50 Cent. It specializes in hip hop and rap music. It was started in 2005 and is part of the Universal Music Group. The company is based in New York City. It has so far signed artists such as G-Unit, Lloyd Banks and Tony Yayo. ==Other websites== *Official website Category:American record labels Category:Hip hop
title: G-Unit Records
